description: Floating IP deletion from an interface uses a deprecated syntax. which results in a warning from the 'ip' command. Adding '/32' suffix to the end should resolve it.
title: ip address deletion uses deprecated syntax

comments.content: Floating IP deletion from an interface uses a deprecated syntax. which results in a warning from the 'ip' command. Adding '/32' suffix to the end should resolve it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~stanislaw-pitucha

commit 60b3d3fbd12f62fd2077401c12112fc48c886246
Author: Stanislaw Pitucha <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Sep 30 15:50:29 2011 +0100

    Use new ip addr del syntax
    
    Start appending the /32 suffix to the addresses when removing floating IPs.
    Fixes bug 865371.
    
    Change-Id: I77df5748ba5417b7474a90e641ecc8adc76921c2
